content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: AGETXT
      operator: non_empty
    - any:
        - name: BRTHDTC
          operator: non_empty
        - name: AGE
          operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.103
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: AGETXT is used to present the age range in situations where the exact
  birthdate is not known.  If AGETXT is included both BRTHDTC and AGE should not be
  populated.
Outcome:
  Message: AGETXT is populated, so neither BRTHDTC nor AGE may be populated
  Output Variables:
    - USUBJID
    - AGETXT
    - BRTHDTC
    - AGE
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Study
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '103'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: AGETXT is used to present the age range in situations
                  where the exact birthdate is not known.  If AGETXT is included both
                  BRTHDTC and AGE should not be populated.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 5.1.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: AGETXT is used to present the age range in situations where the exact birthdate is not known.  If AGETXT is included both BRTHDTC and AGE should not be populated.

Outcome.Message: AGETXT is populated, so neither BRTHDTC nor AGE may be populated

Citations.Cited_Guidance: AGETXT is used to present the age range in situations where the exact birthdate is not known.  If AGETXT is included both BRTHDTC and AGE should not be populated.
